rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is[ST:wide ]—
My intellectual curiosity is being intensely stimulated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0002
rows.name:
What is this vast, empty space?
There's nothing here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0003
rows.name:
A quiet place.
It feels like being inside a cathedral.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0004
rows.name: Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0004_2
rows.name:
The cold capsules of the immigrant group
that escaped Earth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0005
rows.name: Weren't they supposed to be stored here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0007
rows.name: Don't tell me this is the wrong place too!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0008
rows.name: Eh? That's impossible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0009
rows.name: That can't be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0010
rows.name:
The exterior here was exactly that of the Central Life
shown in the mission data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0011
rows.name:
As Lin says,
this is the destination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then why
aren't the people of the immigrant group here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0013
rows.name:
NLA's[ST:wide ]—
No, the upper echelons of the Earth Life Colonization Project...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0014
rows.name:
explained that your bodies are in capsules,
and your consciousness is transferred from there to the [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0015
rows.name: That is what they have explained until now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0016
rows.name: But the fact is different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0017
rows.name: Eh, what do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0018
rows.name:
Earthlings... damned scum.
If it weren't for the delay in removing the barrier, by now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0019
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0020
rows.name: That is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0020_2
rows.name: Isn't that the unit stolen from NLA!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0021
rows.name: Growth soldiers!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0022
rows.name: Who the hell is that brain-guy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0023
rows.name:
You must be Luxaar.
The Growth Grandmaster Lao spoke of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0024
rows.name: That guy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0025
rows.name:
A name not to be spoken lightly
by cancer cells of the universe like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0026
rows.name: Only the Great One may call me that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0027
rows.name: Great One?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0028
rows.name:
Cancer cells are to be exterminated.
That is the Growth's destiny![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0029
rows.name: What are you afraid of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0030
rows.name:
You destroyed the Earth,
and even on this planet, you persistently continued to destroy the Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0031
rows.name: What are you so scared of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0032
rows.name: To the point of bringing out such a broken unit[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0033
rows.name:
Yes[ST:wide ]— that unit is broken.
Something important is missing from it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0034
rows.name:
Do you realize that?
Do you sense it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0035
rows.name:
Is it the origin of Earthlings that makes you do so?
Even for a wooden doll like you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0036
rows.name: Origin, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0037
rows.name: You... are not just a wooden doll, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0038
rows.name:
I see. The Trion-type barrier too... You...
So you are the source of all these ominous events![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0039
rows.name: Eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0040
rows.name: It seems I was mistaken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0041
rows.name:
As expected, perhaps you really were
the safety device told of in myths.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0042
rows.name:
But do not think we Growth will be
quietly sealed away by wooden dolls like you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0043
rows.name:
By the time the Great One descends,
I will purify the earth of this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0044
rows.name: Perish, Earthlings![ST:wait ]
